refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: SystemBuilder uses an optional configuration file systembuilder.conf located at /etc/systembuilder/. The location of this file can be overridden using the -c or --config SystemBuilder command line option. The default SystemBuilder installation does not include a systembuilder.conf file.

listitem.para: Specifies a directory PATH in which one or more SystemBuilder modules can be found. The default is the system path. Multiple path elements are allowed. This element corresponds to the --lib-path command-line option.

Specifies the directory and filename PATH to which SystemBuilder writes logging information. The default path is /var/log/systembuilder.log. SystemBuilder creates the log file if none exists. This element corresponds to the --log-file command-line option.

Specifies a directory PATH in which one or more of SystemBuilder's shared files can be found; the directory contains a hierarchy enabling SystemBuilder to extract files for schemas, *.rng, fonts and images. The default path is /usr/share/systembuilder. Multiple path elements are allowed. This element corresponds to the --share-path command-line option .

Specifies a boolean value which enables or disables debug mode in SystemBuilder. Enabling debug mode causes exception tracebacks, which are normally visible only in the log file, to be additionally displayed on the command line.

refsect1.title: CACHE ELEMENTS
refsect1.para: SystemBuilder caches data across sessions for improved performance. The cache element allows specifying cache-related options.

listitem.para: The path child element specifies where SystemBuilder stores both shared and per system cache data. The default is /var/cache/systembuilder.

The max-size child element specifies the maximum size for the shared cache located at CACHEDIR/.cache. The shared cache contains a copy of all files downloaded by SystemBuilder. There is no human-readable form of the shared cache. The default size is 30GB. The recommended minimum size is 5GB. The default suffix is GB; other common suffixes are MB, GiB and TB.
SystemBuilder deletes files from the shared cache on a least-recently used basis.

refsect1.title: VARIABLES
refsect1.para: SystemBuilder element values, where indicated, use the variables below.

listitem.para: BOOLEAN is one of the following values: Yes, yes, True, true, On, on, 1, No, no, False, false, Off, off, 0.
CACHEDIR is the directory location where SystemBuilder stores shared and per-system cache data.
PATH is the local absolute and relative file paths that SystemBuilder supports. SystemBuilder resolves relative paths from the current working directory.
TEXT is a string value. The description of each element explains that element's expected values or acceptable variations.
